meanings.definition: The quality or state of being rumbustious.
meanings.sent1: Her rumbustiousness at the party made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The children's rumbustiousness during recess was hard to miss.
meanings.sent3: Despite her small size, her rumbustiousness filled the room with energy.
meanings.sent4: The rumbustiousness of the thunderstorm kept us awake all night.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's rumbustiousness was endearing to all who met him.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of being noisy and unruly.
meanings.sent1: The classroom was filled with rumbustiousness during the game.
meanings.sent2: The rumbustiousness of the crowd at the concert added to the excitement.
meanings.sent3: His rumbustiousness at the family dinner caused quite a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The rumbustiousness of the wind outside matched his restless mood.
meanings.sent5: The rumbustiousness of the street performers drew a large audience.
